de.cect.blockid.identitystorage.datamanager.logic.impl.usecase

Class UcPersistCommitedIdentityAssertionsImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.cect.blockid.identitystorage.datamanager.logic.impl.usecase.UcPersistCommitedIdentityAssertionsImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UcPersistCommitedIdentityAssertions

    @Component
 @Transactional
public class UcPersistCommitedIdentityAssertionsImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements UcPersistCommitedIdentityAssertions
    Implementation of UcPersistCommitedIdentityAssertions which fetches the cached identity assertions from the adapter and persists them. This implementation uses a scheduler to trigger itself.
    Since:
    blockid-0.0.1
    Author:
    ctinnes
